text: phir kya vah vyakti jisake lie usaka bura karm suhaana bana diya gaya ho aur vah use achchha dikh raha ho (to kya vah buraee ko chhodega)? nishchay hee allaah jise chaahata hai maarg se vanchit rakhata hai aur jise chaahata hai seedha maarg dikhaata hai. atah unapar afasos karate-karate tumhaaree jaan na jaatee rahe. allaah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai jo kuchh ve rach rahe hai
